    • Method Detail

      • createDialogWindow

        public int createDialogWindow()
        This method creates a dialog window where the user can input a specified iteration. The value is used to create the similarity measure in StatisticsLogic.getStatistics().
        Returns:
        The specified iteration to compare similarity with.

      • populateLivingCells

        public javafx.scene.chart.XYChart.Series<java.lang.Number,java.lang.Number> populateLivingCells(int[][] stats)
        This method populates the series used in the line chart to show living cells.
        Parameters:
        stats - The statistics array produced by StatisticsLogic.getStatistics().
        Returns:
        Fully populated series ready to be applied to the line chart.

      • populateChangeInLivingCells

        public javafx.scene.chart.XYChart.Series<java.lang.Number,java.lang.Number> populateChangeInLivingCells(int[][] stats)
        This method populates the series used in the line chart to show change in living cells.
        Parameters:
        stats - The statistics array produced by StatisticsLogic.getStatistics().
        Returns:
        Fully populated series ready to be applied to the line chart.
